title: ShareServe — Instant Messaging App with Photo/Video Sharing and AI Generation

requirements.text: Implement backend user account system: users can register with a unique username, auto-generated profile number (e.g., #00123), display name, avatar URL, and bio. Store profiles in stable backend state. Support login via Internet Identity.

quotes: you can create an account and create its own number and profile

acceptanceCriteria: A user can register and receive a unique profile number.
Profile data (username, display name, avatar, bio) is persisted in the backend.
Login is gated by Internet Identity.

requirements.text: Implement a contacts system: users can search for other users by username or profile number, send contact requests, accept or decline requests, and view their contacts list.
acceptanceCriteria: A user can search for another user by username or profile number.
Contact requests can be sent, accepted, or declined.
Accepted contacts appear in the user's contacts list.

requirements.text: Implement in-app messaging between registered users: users can send and receive text messages in one-on-one chat threads. Messages are stored in the backend and retrieved per conversation. Messaging only works between accounts within the app — no external SMS or phone network integration.

quotes: messaging is between in-app accounts only

acceptanceCriteria: A user can open a chat with a contact and send text messages.
Messages are stored and retrievable from the backend.
No external phone or SMS integration exists.

requirements.text: Implement photo sharing in chats and on a user profile feed: users can upload photos (stored as base64 or asset URL in the backend), share them in messages, and view shared photos in a gallery-style feed.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can attach and send photos in chat messages.
Shared photos are visible in a profile/feed gallery.
Photos are stored and retrievable from the backend.

requirements.text: Implement video sharing in chats and on a user profile feed: users can upload short videos, share them in messages, and play them inline within the chat or feed view.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can attach and send video files in chat.
Videos play inline in the chat or feed.
Videos are stored and retrievable from the backend.

requirements.text: Add an AI image generation feature accessible from a dedicated 'Create' tab: users enter a text prompt and receive a generated image they can save to their profile or share in a chat. Generation follows standard content policies.

quotes: you can create image generations on it

acceptanceCriteria: A 'Create' tab or section is accessible from the main navigation.
Users can type a prompt and trigger image generation.
Generated images can be saved or shared in a chat.

requirements.text: Add an AI video generation feature on the same 'Create' tab: users enter a text prompt or description and receive a generated short video clip they can save or share. Generation follows standard content policies.
acceptanceCriteria: Video generation prompt input is available on the 'Create' tab.
A generated video clip can be previewed, saved, or shared.
Feature is visually distinct from image generation but on the same tab.

requirements.text: Build the full frontend UI with a dark theme: deep dark backgrounds (near-black), vibrant neon accent colors (e.g., electric violet, cyan, hot pink), glowing UI elements, animated text effects (shimmer, glow, typewriter), gradient highlights, and a sleek futuristic layout. Apply the theme consistently across all screens.
acceptanceCriteria: All screens use a consistent dark background.
Accent colors and glowing effects are applied to buttons, icons, and headings.
At least one animated text effect (e.g., shimmer or glow) is used on key UI elements.
Typography and layout feel polished and futuristic.

requirements.text: Add a 'Video Facts' section or widget on the home/discovery screen: display a rotating carousel of short informational video cards covering interesting topics (space, science, history, etc.). Videos are static placeholder clips with overlay text facts.

quotes: video facts and all kinds of things

acceptanceCriteria: A 'Video Facts' section is visible on the home or discovery screen.
At least 3 fact cards are displayed in a horizontal carousel or swipeable list.
Each card shows a video/animation background with an overlaid text fact.

requirements.text: Build a user profile screen showing: profile number, avatar, display name, username, bio, post/photo/video gallery, and a button to edit profile details.
acceptanceCriteria: Profile screen displays all listed fields.
Gallery shows photos and videos shared by the user.
An edit button allows updating display name, bio, and avatar.

constraints: No external SMS, phone network, or real-world messaging integration.
AI generation must follow standard content policies — no unmoderated or unrestricted generation.
All backend logic must live in a single Motoko actor (backend/main.mo).
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui.
nonGoals: Real-time WebSocket-based messaging (polling or query-based updates only).
External AI API integration (OpenAI, Stability AI, etc.).
SMS verification or real phone number assignment.

required: ShareServe app logo — bold neon-outlined 'S' monogram with a glowing electric violet and cyan gradient on a near-black background, modern futuristic style (shareserve-logo.dim_256x256.png)
Dark abstract background texture with faint grid lines and subtle neon glow particles for use as a full-screen app background (app-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
Video facts card placeholder background — blurred cosmic/space scene with deep blues and purples (video-facts-bg.dim_800x450.png)
